Articles.Content:
I have to say many thank yous.

Thank you SQUAD for making the best Computer Game I have ever played

Thank you for changing my life, I want to work at NASA!

Thank you KSP Community for your kindness

Thank you KSP Community for your help for when I was struggling in KSP

Thank you for this great game, May it live on forever and inspire many lives to take the path to science.

And many more thank yous!

MERRY CHRISTMAS EVERYONE! AND A HAPPY NEW YEAR!

I want to work at NASA!

Making powerpoints and diagrams?

Ha, ha, ha... *Starts crying.

Making powerpoints and diagrams?
And landing rovers on Mars, encountering comets, launching orbital telescopes, etc.
I have to agree that this is the best online community I've ever encountered. You folks are awesome!

And landing rovers on Mars, encountering comets, launching orbital telescopes, etc.

And become shut down by the government arguing about social insurrance that germany has for over 100years now

I gotta say KSP has also changed me a bit like the OP said. I don't want to work for NASA just because the Government is involved (would ratgher go private) but I want to learn more about orbital mechanics and everything else which I've already been studying the space race since I was first introduced to this game!
